timeline.message:
Parse anonymous class in C#.

E.g.

```csharp
var a = new { someprop = "Somevalue" };
```

timeline.bodyText: Hmm should we use anonymous objects, a.k.a Record instead of AnonClass?
timeline.author: aryx
timeline.diffHunk:

-        | None -> todo env ())
+        | Some tok -> Some (token env tok) (* "," *)
+        | None -> None)
       in
